mapper.select: SELECT t1.post_id, t1.title, t1.node, t1.content, t1.create_time, t1.update_time, t1.like_number, t1.comment_number, CASE WHEN t2.likes_id IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS like_status FROM post t1 LEFT JOIN likes t2 ON t1.post_id = t2.post_id AND t2.user_id = #{userId} AND t2.type = '0' AND t2.del_flag = '0' WHERE t1.del_flag = '0' AND t1.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT t1.post_id, t1.title, t1.node, t1.content, t1.create_time, t1.update_time, t1.like_number, t1.comment_number, CASE WHEN t2.likes_id IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS like_status FROM post t1 LEFT JOIN likes t2 ON t1.post_id = t2.post_id AND t2.user_id = #{userId} AND t2.type = '0' AND t2.del_flag = '0' LEFT JOIN post_audit t3 ON t1.post_audit_id = t3.post_audit_id WHERE t1.del_flag = '0' AND t1.user_id = #{otherUserId} AND t3.audit_status = 1
